author: Allexxann
body:
Simply put: a cmdlet, which when ran checks for latest version of PSCore, and downloads and installs it, if there's a new release.
WindowsPS is updated via OS update system, but Core is only in manual mode, frustrating.

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: I have heard the occasional whisper about PS Core potentially also being pulled into a Windows Update sequence, where if you have it installed it would allow you to get updates via that channel. Not sure if that's still on the cards or how far away it would be, though.
